channel.title: DCKIM-en
channel.description: DCKIM: Independent Canadian Open-Source HTML Software From Toronto Ontario

item.title: Dear-Yonge-Street
item.description: A Brief thank-you letter to the City of Toronto, on Yonge Street in North York, for allowing me to use their community sign-posting board to advertise this HTML Drafting Project.

item.title: On-a-mission
item.description: Working hard to produce the best HTML drafting program ever devised.

item.title: HTML-Drawing
item.description: HTML Drafting is for beginners and hobbyists. Slap some stuff onto the page, then post it on your website. This is for regular folks, not big-time web-developers.

item.title: HTML-is-hanging-by-some-threads
item.description: Dear NERDS, an Open-Letter promoting this HTML Drafting Project on Yonge Street in North York, near the Famous OWL's Meat Shop.
